title: Week of Feb 8, 2026
summary: New index groups for KRJ signals, market cap data, and position risk improvements.

features.title: NDX 100 Index Group
features.summary: New signal group tracking all Nasdaq 100 components
features.description:
The KRJ signals page now includes a dedicated NDX 100 group. This lets you see momentum signals for all 100 components of the Nasdaq 100 index in one view — filter by Long/Short/Neutral, sort by any column, and quickly identify which large-cap tech names are showing directional momentum.

Access it from the group selector dropdown on the Signals tab.

features.title: Market Cap Column
features.summary: See market capitalization directly in the signals table
features.description:
Every signal row now displays market capitalization alongside the existing volume and volatility metrics. Values are shown in compact notation ($1.2T, $450B, etc.) so you can instantly gauge the size of each name without leaving the page.

The column is sortable — click the header to rank by market cap.
